```{r}
##clean snp data
snp_df=
  read_csv("data/snp.csv") |>
  separate(date,into=c("month","day","year"), convert =TRUE)|>
  mutate(
    year = as.numeric(year),
    month = as.numeric(month)
  ) %>%
  arrange(year, month) %>%
  select(year, month, everything(), -day)
```
